subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
organizations: Chambers Bay Golf Course (University Place, Wash)
lead_paragraph: With a 15-foot bogey putt on the 528-yard, par-4 14th hole at Chambers Bay, Phil Mickelson, a six-time United States Open runner-up, rescued his round.
snippet: With a 15-foot bogey putt on the 528-yard, par-4 14th hole at Chambers Bay, Phil Mickelson, a six-time United States Open runner-up, rescued his round.
